Posts.EditableText: WOOT! ITID - I've told you already so you've had your chance to reply. By reading this you have forfeit all right to reply and take legal action against me at any future date; MWAHAHAHAHA! I hopefully I have a job starting this Friday. I gave in an application form Monday to Tesco's (it's a Supermarket - kinda like Walmart) and got an interview Thursday. The guy who was there interviewed me and said I probably wasn't suited for the job (c'mon - stacking shelves?) but offered me a trial 1.5 hours work thingy Sunday night. His excuse was I wasn't suited for the job because I wasn't "enthusiastic" - he can shove that enthusiasm up his ass. Anyway, I did this trial thingy today and this other guy was there - he said "do you have a job at the moment? Because if you don't then we'd like to offer you a job." and said I have to go in for an induction this Thursday for 5 hours. Good thing is it's basically watching video's and stuff. Even better thing is I'm probably gonna get paid for it . SUCKE- . Anyway, I'm hoping that with this job I'll be a bit more motivated and with money coming in alot more money for snacks to keep me at this PC. Possibly books and stuff to help me learn C++/C# before Christmass (although I'm gonna learn before Chrissy anyway 8) ). Right - just a finishing note to say: I r0x0r5! I 4m Ub3r L3e7!!1!

I hopefully I have a job starting this Friday.
I gave in an application form Monday to Tesco's (it's a Supermarket - kinda like Walmart) and got an interview Thursday. The guy who was there interviewed me and said I probably wasn't suited for the job (c'mon - stacking shelves?) but offered me a trial 1.5 hours work thingy Sunday night. His excuse was I wasn't suited for the job because I wasn't "enthusiastic" - he can shove that enthusiasm up his ass.

Anyway, I did this trial thingy today and this other guy was there - he said "do you have a job at the moment? Even better thing is I'm probably gonna get paid for it . SUCKE- .

Anyway, I'm hoping that with this job I'll be a bit more motivated and with money coming in alot more money for snacks to keep me at this PC. Possibly books and stuff to help me learn C++/C# before Christmass (although I'm gonna learn before Chrissy anyway 8) ).

Posts.EditableText: lol.  I've worked at 3 McDonalds.  1 near morrisons (i live in blackpool), which is crap coz it's not only small, but everybody is weird, the managers (woman!) hug you and feel you up to get favours (scary), and i've worked at one which is right on the prom, so you can imagine the amount of girls that come in dressed up to go clubbing, wearing hardly anything.  And then there is my main one which i worked at which get pretty darn busy at times (plus we have drivethrough), but it's good all the same.
